'''Eurydates''' is a mentioned [[NPC]] from [[Enkanomiya]] and the father of [[Date]].

==Profile==
According to [[Ema]], Eurydates was from a wealthy and distinguished clan of [[Byakuyakoku]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Collection of Dragons and Snakes}}</ref> According to Date, his father used crutches and used them to beat Date up because his writing "lacked rhyme or rhetoric."<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Date's Challenge}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* {{w|Eurybates}} is a name of several Trojan War characters, and was adapted by {{w|John Racine}} as "Eurydates" for his tragedies.
